alert.note: Alert for Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Poinsett and northwestern Cross Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hickory Ridge, or 16 miles northwest of Wynne, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Weiner, Hickory Ridge, Waldenburg, Fisher, Brushy Lake, Pitts, Hydrick, Uno, Pittinger, Supply, Tilton and Bayou De View State Wildlife Management Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
